MICROPORE ANALYZER

CUSTOM MADE FOR FILTRATION INDUSTRY

Standard: ASTM F316, ASTM D6767
Measurement range: 0.1-100 microns
Test Duration: 0-3 min
Precision: 99.99%

Preorder now for $100. You will be able to customize the specification over the next 2 weeks with support from our technical team.






TECHNOLOGY

The MicroPore Analyzer device is one of the most advanced pore size analyzers in the market. The device is based on liquid displacement and capillary flow porometry technology. The device is custom-made for filtration industry and perfectly suited for performance evaluation of almost all types filtration products.

APPLICATION

  • Air Filter Products
  • Hepa Filters
  • Woven/Non-Wovens
  • Spunbond Media
  • Meltdown Media

CUTTING EDGE DESIGN

SIMPLE | INTELLIGENT | MORE INTEGRATED

The hardware system has evolved into a highly sophisticated instrument with increased ease-of-operation, data accuracy, reliability and end-to-end automated operation.

ADVANCED SOFTWARE

AI BASED | DYNAMIC REPORTS | EASY TO USED

Unprecedented visualization and collaboration using new M19 software control program and test report program. Experience the power of A.I based cognitive software control program that virtually eliminated user bias throughout the data acquisition process and data interpretation, redefining the way data is generated and consumed by your team.


FAQ's

What is Micropore Analyzer used for?

This is not your conventional laboratory. Itâ€™s a confidential lab membership program for product innovators to get access to material testing facilities and gain exclusive product performance insights.

How does Micropore work?

Members pay a monthly or annual flat fee depending on their volume of testing requirements; and get access to an online portal to place orders, view results, and create their own personal R&D database.

Who uses Micropore instruments?

Manufacturers, Industries, Research Institutes, Govt. Labs, Academia, and selected Startups can get access to the membership programs. An individual person is not allowed.

What are Micropore Analyzer benefits?

Members get access to their industry-related lab testing services, customized research services, industry insights, lab data management platform, and training courses.

What are the basic requirements for Micropore Analyzer usage?

You need to apply for the membership program and get accepted, or you have to be referred by an existing member.

How will Micropore Analyzer help my company?

Members gain a competitive advantage by getting deep material insights into their products. Some members use our services to verify vendor selections.

Are there any other hidden charges?

There are no annual fees and no hidden charges with M19 Lab Membership. M19 Lab offers the option of paying in EMIs up to 12 months.

Can I cancel my membership?

You can cancel your membership within 30 days to get a full refund. For monthly users; you can cancel your membership anytime.
